Brief description: Study to examine EEG correlates of genetic predisposition to alcoholism.
Preprocessing: Measurements from 64 electrodes placed on the scalp sampled at 256 Hz (3.9 ms epoch) for 1 second.
Creator: H. Begleiter

Brief description: Data from nine subjects collected using P300-based brain-computer interface for disabled subjects.
Preprocessing: Split into four sessions for each subject. MATLAB code given.
Creator: U. Hoffman et al.

Brief description: Attributed of patients with and without heart disease.
Preprocessing: 75 attributes given for each patient with some missing values.
Creator: A. Janosi et al.

Brief description: Dataset of features of breast masses. Diagnoses by physician is given.
Preprocessing: 10 features for each sample are given.
Creator: W. Wolberg et al.

Dataset Name: National Survey on Drug Use and Health
Brief description: Large scale survey on health and drug use in the United States.
Creator: United States Department of Health and Human Services

Brief description: Lung cancer dataset without attribute definitions
Preprocessing: 56 features are given for each case
Creator: Z. Hong et al.

Brief description: Data for a group of patients, of which some have cardiac arrhythmia.
Creator: H. Altay et al.

Brief description: 9 years of readmission data across 130 US hospitals for patients with diabetes.
Preprocessing: Many features of each readmission are given.
Creator: J. Clore et al.

Brief description: Features extracted from images of eyes with and without diabetic retinopathy.
Creator: B. Antal et al.

Brief description: Methods to evaluate segmentation and indexing techniques in the field of retinal ophthalmology (MESSIDOR)
Preprocessing: Features retinopathy grade and risk of macular edema
Creator: Messidor Project

Brief description: Data for people with liver disorders.
Preprocessing: Seven biological features given for each patient.
Creator: Bupa Medical Research Ltd.

Brief description: 10 databases of thyroid disease patient data.
Creator: R. Quinlan

Preprocessing: Large number of features, including asbestos exposure, are given.
Creator: A. Tanrikulu et al.

Brief description: 2D human pose estimates of Parkinson's patients performing a variety of tasks.
Preprocessing: Camera shake has been removed from trajectories.
Creator: M. Li et al.

Brief description: Network of metabolic pathways. A reaction network and a relation network are given.
Preprocessing: Detailed features for each network node and pathway are given.
Creator: M. Naeem et al.
